name: Donald the Hero
overview: The first game written in Assembler for C64 by Frank Abbing. Published in Magic Disk 64 1988/06, Digital Marketing PD #043 and also in Digital Marketing PD #067. Donald aims to become as rich as his uncle Dagobert. He already owns a money hold building. Among a lawn in Duck Town money roams through the air, he just his to catch it...
